long_description: Wear the Patagonia RECCO(R) Tech Web belt when you're skiing or snowboarding. It has an embedded RECCO reflector at the back that can help search-and-rescue crews find you in an emergency. Embedded RECCO reflector enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors, helping speed up the search for a buried avalanche victim. Reflector weighs less than an ounce and never needs batteries or requires any maintenance. Quick-drying nylon belt doubles as an emergency lash strap for attaching things your backpack. Patagonia RECCO Tech Web belt has a forged aluminum buckle that is lightweight and strong, and features a notch to pry off bottle caps.
